name: Reclaimed Barn Wood And Wrought Iron Wall Rack
description:
The combination of reclaimed barn wood and wrought iron is a perfect match. Able to fit into nearly any home decor. No two are the same and the history and character attached to each piece of this wood cannot be duplicated.

This one was made with a 2" thick piece of white oak flooring from an ancient dairy barn here in Vermont that was dismantled last year. Shown with four of our large hand forged ball end wall hooks in the rust finish. It is a heavy impressive wall rack that can hold nearly anything you choose to hang on it.

The look of real barn wood and hand forged wrought iron is extremely popular now and we will be adding new pieces in the coming months.

Approximately 32" long but can be made in other lengths and hook sizes. Please email or call our shop with any questions or special requests at......802-483-2575

All mounting hardware is included.

*******This item is in stock and ready to ship******

name: Handrail brackets, Hand Forged
description:
Our wrought iron brackets are very strong and can hold any handrail with ease and look great doing it! 

Made so the angle can be adjusted to whatever is needed by the pivoting mounting bracket attached under the railing.

Made from 1/2" steel and approximately 9" long. Mounting screws are provided. 

As always, hand forged one at a time. Heated in our coal forge and hammered to shape on an antique anvil right here in our Vermont blacksmith shop. These are shown with the spade end but also available in the rams head, candle flame and penny ends. Nothing will made your staircase and handrail look better than real hand forged wrought iron!

********This listing is for one handrail bracket*******

Please call our shop for any questions or special requests at..........802-483-2575

name: Plant Hanger, Wrought Iron
description:
This is another one of our wrought iron plant hangers we are offering this year. 

Made from 3/8" square steel for hanging heavy plant baskets. These add a simple elegance to wherever they are used in your home. 

Hand forged one at a time right here in our Vermont blacksmith shop. Heated in a coal forge and hammered to shape on an antique anvil as always.

These sit approximately 12 " away from the wall. Screws are provided with all our iron work.

We do have these in stock and ready to ship.

Please call our shop with any questions or special requests at.....802-483-2575

name: Flower Blossom Curtain Tie Back
description:
After numerous requests, here is our flower blossom style curtain hold back we are now offering from our shop.

Hand forged one at a time right here as always, in our Vermont blacksmith shop. Heated in a coal forge and hand hammered to shape on an antique anvil. No big box store can compete with the distinctive look of real hand forged curtain hardware.

Shown in our black oil finish but also available in the rust brown and gray forge finishes and in left and right hand versions. Mounting screws are always provided with our iron work. Approximately 5" long. 


********This price is for one curtain tie back ******

Please call our shop and ask for Scott for any questions or special requests at ......802-483-2575

****Given the high volume of sales from both businesses, please expect from 2 to 4 weeks before your order is completed and shipped depending on available stock on hand and workload at that time. Multiple orders may take more time to complete as well as custom orders. Items that are in stock will ship out within a week of placing your order****

name: Wrought Iron Curved Wall Rack
description:
Here is a new version of our penny end wall rack but now available with a curve! This was requested by one of our customers and I decided to add it to our list of regular items we make here.

These are approximately 18 inches long with 5 one inch hooks and the curve is about 3" away from the wall. They can me made in other lengths if needed and different ends as well. Such as our spade, ball and spear or heart ends.

Shown in our black oil and rust brown finishes but also available in the gray forge finish.

Our customers have used these in the kitchen to hang cooking spoons and untensils as well as small pots and pot holders. They are also very good at hanging coffee mugs especially with the new curve that allows for the items hanging to be more away from the wall.

****We do combine shipping costs for multiple orders. Please call or email****

Please call our shop and ask for Scott with any questions or special requests at........802-483-2575

****Given the high volume of sales from both businesses, please expect from 2 to 6 weeks before your order is completed and shipped depending on available stock on hand and work load at that time. Multiple orders may take more time to complete as well as custom orders. Items that are in stock will ship out within a week of placing your order****

name: Vermont Pine Farmhouse Table
description:
This is another table we offer from our furniture shop here in Vermont. It is our traditional pine farmhouse table shown in the first picture with the standard style 5 1/2" turned legs and optional drawer and our standard color finish. The second picture is the same style table but with our 5 1/2" reproduction style leg and 6" bread board ends, finished in our amber color. Both tables show the 1 3/4" thick top option as well.

These tables have other options available for them and can be made in any length and several different woods. 

As always, our furniture is hand planed and aged to make our tables resemble an antique piece that has seen many years of use.

The price below is for a table that is 42" wide x 84" long.

This price does not include shipping and varies depending on the size of the table and your state.


All of our tables are made to order with many options available. Please visit our web site at.......
http://hawleysfinewoodworking.com......to see more pictures as well as other styles and options.

Please call our shop and ask for Scott at 802-483-2575 for more information and shipping costs. 

We ship all of our furniture through a white glove moving service

name: Double Ball End Coat Hooks, Hand Forged
description:
Here is our variation of a classic double ball end wall hook. Made from 3/8" stock for extra strength to hang the heaviest or multiple coats and hats....these are very strong hooks.

Heated in a coal fired forged and hand hammered to shape on an antique anvil right here in our Vermont blacksmith shop. These will add a very obvious look of hand forged wrought iron to your home, wherever you put them.

Shown in our black oil finish but also available in our rust brown or gray forged finishes.

Up to 8 hooks can be shipped in one flat rate box with no increase in shipping costs. Mounting screws are always provided with our iron work.

Please call or email our shop at .....802-483-2575 and ask for Scott for any questions or special requests.

****Given the high volume of sales from both businesses, please expect from 2 to 8 weeks before your order is completed and shipped depending on available stock on hand and workload at that time. Multiple orders may take more time to complete as well as custom orders. Items that are in stock will ship out within a week of placing your order*****

name: Large Ball End Wall Hook, Hand Forged
description:
Here is another hook style to come out of our blacksmith shop right here in Vermont.

They are a large heavy duty hook that can handle whatever you throw at it and look good doing it. I made these large enough so my customers would be able to hang several hangers full of clothes from them if needed and not worry about it bending. Mounting screws are included with each hook.

Made from 3/8" thick steel and about 6" long with a 2 1/2" inside diameter. Hand forged one at a time and hammered to shape on an antique anvil, you will not find anything like these in a big box store.....nothing beats the unique look of real hand made wrought iron work.

Shown in our rust brown finish but also available in our black oil and gray forge finishes.

Shipped priority mail and up to 6 hooks can fit into one flat rate box with no extra cost for postage.


Other sizes available, please call or email our shop and ask for Scott at.........802-483-2575

****Given the high volume of sales from both businesses, please expect from 2 to 6 weeks before your order is completed and shipped depending on available stock on hand and work load at that time. Multiple orders may take more time to complete as well as custom orders. Items that are in stock will ship out within a week of placing your order*****

name: Farmhouse table, Reclaimed Barn wood
description:
This is another farm table from our furniture shop we just finished for a customer in California. It is made from reclaimed barn boards from a ancient dairy barn here in vermont. The top is made from 2" thick white oak floor boards and the legs are made from a 6" x 6" chestnut beam from the same barn. The iron work was made here as always, in our blacksmith shop. The legs are turned one at a time on a vintage lathe right here in our wood shop as well.

This table had a natural finish applied to bring out the color of this very special wood. All surfaces are hand planed and using only hand tools to achieve the desired antique aged look.

This is a custom made to order table and wood options are limited to what is available at the moment from our supplier. Chestnut beams are common but the white oak flooring is harder to find. Hemlock and spruce are available as well for the top and typically more common.

This table was 77" x 43" but is available in any size needed. Price does not include shipping and depends on your location and size of table. We ship all of our furniture through a white glove moving service.

All of our tables are made to order with many options available. Please visit our web site at.......
http://hawleysfinewoodworking.com......to see more pictures as well as other styles and options.
Please call our shop and ask for Scott at 802-483-2575 for questions and shipping costs.

name: Paper Towel Holder, Penny And Ball End
description:
Here is another style one of our customers thought up for their paper towel holder they ordered and I decided to add it to our store as well. It has our very popular penny and ball ends rather than the candle flame and scroll as in our other listing.

These can be mounted on the wall either vertically or horizontally or as a double toilet paper holder attached in the same manner, if space is a concern. They also work well for just a regular small towel if you choose.

Approximately 19" long and made from 1/2" stock. These look great anywhere you put them and add a distinctive look of hand forged Vermont wrought iron to your home.

Made one at a time, heated in our coal forge and hand hammered to shape on an antique anvil. 

Shown in our black oil finish but also available in our rust brown and gray forge finishes. These can be made in other sizes and styles if needed. Mounting screws are always provided with our ironwork.

****We do combine shipping costs for multiple orders. Please call or email****


######## These are made to order #######


Please call or email our shop with any questions or special requests and ask for Scott at........802-483-2575

****Given the high volume of sales from both businesses, please expect from 4 to 8 weeks before your order is completed and shipped depending on available stock on hand and work load at that time. Multiple orders may take more time to complete as well as custom orders. Items that are in stock will ship out within a week of placing your order*****

name: Curtain Tie Back, Leaf End
description:
Here is another style curtain hold back we are now offering from our shop. These are patterned after our very popular leaf end wall hooks.


Hand forged one at a time right here as always, in our Vermont blacksmith shop. Heated in a coal forge and hand hammered to shape on an antique anvil. These add a unique and beautiful addition to your window and curtains appearance. 

Shown in our rust brown finish but also available in the black oil and gray forge finishes and in left and right hand versions. Mounting screws are always provided with our iron work. Approximately 5" long. 

These are also available in other styles including our rams head, ball, scroll and heart shaped ends. 

********This price is for one curtain tie back ******

Please call our shop and ask for Scott for any questions or special requests at ......802-483-2575

****Given the high volume of sales from both businesses, please expect from 2 to 6 weeks before your order is completed and shipped depending on available stock on hand and workload at that time. Multiple orders may take more time to complete as well as custom orders. Items that are in stock will ship out within a week of placing your order*****

name: Wood Ash Stove Shovel, Ball End
description:
After numerous requests to make a shovel to go with our very popular fire pokers, this is what we came up with!

Made in the ball end handle style and our own hammer forged shovel. Attached with real shop made rivets, just like it would have been done before electricity was available.

Made from 1/2" square steel and approximately 30" long, these are very substantial shovels that will last for generations.


Hand made one at a time as always in our Vermont blacksmith shop. Heated in a coal fired forge and hammered to shape on an antique anvil. Each one is unique and one of a kind, adding a distinctive look of real hand forged wrought iron to your fireplace our wood stove setting.

Can be made in longer or shorter lengths. Please call or email our shop with any questions or special requests at ............802-483-2575 and ask for Scott.


########## These are made to order #########


****Given the high volume of sales from both businesses, please expect from 4 to 8 weeks before your order is completed and shipped depending on available stock on hand and workload at that time. Multiple orders may take more time to complete as well as custom orders. Items that are in stock will ship out within a week of placing your order*****

name: Curtain Tie Backs, Scrolled End
description:
These are a new style scrolled end curtain tie back that we are now offering from our shop.

Hand forged one at a time right here as always, in our Vermont blacksmith shop. Heated in a coal forge and hand hammered to shape on an antique anvil. These add a unique and beautiful addition to your window and curtains appearance. 

Shown in our very popular black oil finish but also available in the rust brown and gray forge finishes. Please mention which finish you prefer when ordering. Mounting screws are always provided with our iron work.


These are available in other styles including our rams head, candle flame, ball end and heart shaped ends. Please call the number bellow for details.

*****This price is for 1 curtain tie back. Please mention when ordering if you need a left hand or right hand hold back******

Please call our shop and ask for Scott for any questions or special requests at ......$802-483-2575

****Given the high volume of sales from both businesses, please expect from 2 to 8 weeks before your order is completed and shipped depending on available stock on hand and work load at that time. Multiple orders may take more time to complete as well as custom orders. Items that are in stock will ship out within a week of placing your order*****

name: Curtain Tie Backs, Hand Forged Wrought Iron
description:
Here is another item that had been requested by one of our customers. It is a variation of our large ball end wall hooks but made to be used as a curtain hold back instead.

Hand forged one at a time right here as always, in our Vermont blacksmith shop. Heated in a coal forge and hand hammered to shape on an antique anvil. These add a unique and beautiful addition to your window and curtains appearance. 

Shown in our very popular rust brown finish but also available in the black oil and gray forge finishes. Please mention which finish you prefer when ordering. Mounting screws are always provided with our iron work.

Appropriately 7" long, these can be made smaller if needed.

These are available in other styles including our rams head, candle flame, scroll and heart shaped ends. Please call the number bellow for details.

********This price is for one ball end curtain tie back******

Please call our shop and ask for Scott for any questions or special requests at ......802-483-2575

****Given the high volume of sales from both businesses, please expect from 2 to 8 weeks before your order is completed and shipped depending on available stock on hand and work load at that time. Multiple orders may take more time to complete as well as custom orders. Items that are in stock will ship out within a week of placing your order*****

name: Wrought Iron Fireplace Poker, Scrolled End
description:
This is another style fireplace and wood stove poker we are offering from our Blacksmith shop here in Vermont.

These have a looped scrolled end that fits the hand just right when your adjusting the logs in your fireplace or wood stove and then sits there looking great until it's needed again!

Hand forged as always one at a time. Heated in our coal fired forge and hand hammered to shape on an antique anvil so each one is unique and one of a kind.

Shown in our gray forge finish but also available in our Black oil and Rust brown finishes.

Made from 1/2" thick solid steel and approximately 36" long. These very strong fireplace tools and can be custom sized if needed.

******Fireplace ash shovels and brooms coming soon****** 

Please call or email our shop with any questions or special requests at ............802-483-2575 and ask for Scott.

name: Wrought Iron Fireplace Poker Made In Vermont
description:
This is another of our fireplace tools we make here in our shop. It has a regular pointed and hooked end to tend the fire but has a special forged ball end with a curve that fits your hand just right to give you leverage when moving those stubborn logs. Works great in both the fireplace and the wood stove.

Made from 1/2" square steel which makes for a very substantial piece. Approximately 36" long but can be made to any length. Hand forged right here in our Vermont blacksmith shop one at a time as always.

We use traditional methods in our shop using only a coal fired forge and hand hammering to shape on an antique anvil.


Shown in our black oil finish but also available in our rust finish as well.

Shipped priority mail with delivery confirmation included.

****Given the high volume of sales from both businesses, please expect from 3 to 4 weeks before your order is completed and shipped depending on available stock on hand and work load at that time. Multiple orders may take more time to complete as well as custom orders. Items that are in stock will ship out within a week of placing your order*

name: Made in Vermont Hand Forged Ceiling Hooks
description:
These ceiling hooks are just right for hanging something special in your home when regular store bought hardware just won't do. Just like all our work they are hand forged one at a time in our Vermont blacksmith shop. Approximately 4" long with a 1" hook diameter these can be used in your kitchen for hanging pots and pans, plants or perhaps a hanging candle holder. Available in other sizes larger or smaller these ceiling hooks where ever you use them, will add a distinctive look of hand forged iron work to your home.

Shown in our black oil finish.

Sold in lots of 4***** and shipped priority mail. Up to 12 hooks can be shipped in one box with no increase in postage.

****We do combine shipping costs for multiple orders. Please call or email****


Please call our shop for questions and special requests and ask for Scott at..........802-483-2575

name: Hand Forged Open End "S" Hooks
description:
These are a new item from our blacksmith shop. They had been requested by several customers and I decided to make them available as a regular offering. They are the same as our other style "S" hooks but are more open on one end to catch the handles of pots and pans or other hanging items easier. They compliment our regular wall or ceiling hooks for hanging plants and the open end makes for a perfect coffee mug hanger.

They are also very popular in the fireplace for open hearth cooking as well as the garden.

Made here in Vermont one at a time in our blacksmith shop and shown in our very popular rust brown finish but also available in the black oil and gray forge finishes as well.

Approximately 4" long with an inside diameter of 1 1/2 inches on the more closed end, these can be made in any size needed

We now offer quantity discounts for 50 hooks or more. Please email or call the number below for pricing and details.

Shipped in a small flat rate priority mail box and up to 12 can ordered with no increase in postage.

These can be custom size so please call our shop with any questions and ask for Scott at .........802-483-2575

*****Wall hook in picture is not included. These are available in our other listings*****

name: Ball And Spear Wall Rack
description:
This hook rack is another style to come out of our blacksmith shop right here in Vermont. Hand forged one at a time and hammered to shape on an antique anvil. It is called a Ball and Spear end. This style is a classic colonial design that we will be offering on other items soon to come.

Most people use these type racks for keys but, our customers have also used them in the kitchen to hang brooms or cooking spoons and untensils as well as pot holders. They are also very good at hanging coffee mugs.

Shown in our black oil finish but also available in our rust and gray forge finishes.

Aproximately 18" long with 5 of our small 1" hooks attached. These can be made in any length needed. 

****We do combine shipping costs for multiple orders. Please call or email****

name: Wrought Iron Door pull, Ball and Spear Style
description:
Here is another door pull to come out of out blacksmith shop, here in the green mountains of Vermont.

It is a reproduction of a classic early American style called "Ball and Spear" which was very popular in colonial style homes.

These as well as all our door pulls, are hand forged from a single piece of iron. Heated in our coal fired forge and hammered to shape on an antique anvil.

The iron we use for these pulls is 1" wide x 5/16" thick for a very substantial handle. Grab onto one of our pulls and you know it is handmade, no flimsy stampings here. There is nothing like hand forged iron hardware.

They are approximately 14" long and the ball ends are 2 1/2" in diameter. Mounting screws are included with each handle.

Shown in our black oil finish but also available in our rust brown and gray forge finishes.

Other sizes are available, please call or email our shop at.......802-483-2575 and ask for Scott

name: Hand Forged Leaf Wall Hook
description:
Here is another new hook from our Vermont blacksmith shop. I had been working on a special custom order with several leaves in the design and had a few left over. So I decided to make something out of it and there it is!

About 7 inches long with a 1 1/2" inside diameter on the hook. They can be made in other sizes and however many leaves you would like to add. Shown in our black oil finish but also available in our rust brown and gray forge finishes.

Please call our shop with any questions or special requests and ask for Scott at......802-483-2575

name: Wrought Iron 1" Twist Hooks
description:
Here is another variation of our popular twisted wall hooks. This size had been requested by one of our customers and I decided to offer them as a regular item.

They work great around the home for hanging smaller items where a larger hook may not be needed or is just too big. Such as in the kitchen for cloth pot holders or mittens, cooking utensils, coffee cups and as always, Christmas stockings on the mantel....functional and good looking wherever they are used!

Shown in our rust brown finish but also avilable in our black oil or gray forge finishes as well.

These look the same as our regular size twist hooks but smaller with a 1" inside diameter and only 2 1/2" long. 

These are made from 1/4" square stock and are forged right here in our Vermont blacksmith shop.

******Sold in lots of six with screws provided so you can use them right away****

Up to 18 can be shipped in one small priority mail box with no increase in postage.

****We do combine shipping costs for multiple orders. Please call or email****

Please see our other listings for other sizes and styles of hooks or call our shop at......802-483-2575......and ask for Scott with and questions or special requests

name: Candle flame scrolled end wall hook
description:
These are another style of wall hook from our blacksmith forge right here in Vermont. They have a scrolled end on the hook side with our candle flame shape on the top. 

Approximately 4 1/2" long and 2 1/2" deep and shown with our black oil finish as well as our rust brown. Please mention which finish you prefer when ordering.

As always, hand forged to shape on an antique anvil one at a time. Whether it is a mud room, kitchen, bedroom or to hang the Christmas wreath from your front door!......they will add a special touch of Vermont wrought iron to your home.

Shipped priority mail and up to 12 hooks can ship in one box with no increase in postage. As always we provide screws with all our iron work so you can put them to use right away.

We now offer quantity discounts for 50 or more hooks ordered. Please email or call the number below for details and pricing.

Other sizes available, please call our shop for any questions and ask for Scott at..........802-483-2575

name: Wrought Iron Pot Rack
description:
This is another pot rack we are offering from our blacksmith shop here is the mountains of Vermont. It is a wall mounted version to save space and be more compact. These have been requested from our customers that don't like a pot rack hung from the ceiling but still want something special to hang their pots and pan from.

Hand forged one at a time, heated in our coal forge and hand hammered to shape on an antique anvil. Shown in our dark rust brown finish but also available in our black oil or gray forge finish as well

Approximately 22" long and sits away from the wall about 6" with five hooks. These also work great for hanging cooking utensils or coffee cups, pot holders and for drying herbs......anything that you put on these will look great and add a unique piece of Vermont made wrought iron to your home!

We have one of these in this size in stock but are usually made to order.

These can be made to any size needed and number of hooks. Please call our shop and ask for Scott at........802-483-2575 for any questions or special requests.

name: Farmhouse table in white scrubbed pine
description:
This is another of our farm style dining tables. It is the most popular table we sell, the "white scrubbed pine farmhouse table" . This table is made in pine but we have also made them in cherry and oak for those that wanted a hardwood with the same white scrubbed finish. Shown with the optional one or two drawers and 5 1/2" standard style turned legs and the extra thick 1 3/4" thick top as well. Also shown with the available 18" company boards. These extensions are either 12" or 18" and as you can see, make the table much bigger for the holidays and special times when you need more seating. 

The cost for this table pictured is for a 42" x 84" with the two drawers and company boards. These are optional and can be changed along with the length and width. Prices will vary depending on these options.

Price does not include shipping and will vary by state and final size of table.

All of our tables are made to order with many options available. Please visit our web site at.......
http://hawleysfinewoodworking.com......to see more pictures as well as other styles and options.

We ship all our funiture through a white glove moving service.

Please call our shop and ask for Scott for questions and shipping costs at ....802-483-2575

name: Coffee table antique farmhouse style
description:
This is another table we offer from our furniture shop here in Vermont. It is our traditional pine farmhouse table shown in the first picture with the standard style 5 1/2" turned legs and optional drawer and our standard color finish. The second picture is the same style table but with our 5 1/2" reproduction style leg and 6" bread board ends, finished in our amber color. Both tables show the 1 3/4" thick top option as well.

These tables have other options available for them and can be made in any length and several different woods. 

As always, our furniture is hand planed and aged to make our tables resemble an antique piece that has seen many years of use.

The price below is for a table that is 42" wide x 84" long.

This price does not include shipping and varies depending on the size of the table and your state.


All of our tables are made to order with many options available. Please visit our web site at.......
http://hawleysfinewoodworking.com......to see more pictures as well as other styles and options.

Please call our shop and ask for Scott at 802-483-2575 for more information and shipping costs. 

We ship all of our furniture through a white glove moving service.

name: Wrought iron large spade end barn door pull
description:
This is a new style spade end barn door pull we are offering here from our blacksmith shop in Vermont. They are completely hand forged one at a time. Heated in a coal fire and hammered to shape on an antique anvil.

These are very substantial handles made form 5/16" x 1" iron and 15" long with screws included. Made to resemble the antique hardware found on New England homes and barns. They add a commanding presence to any large door they are on and leave no doubt that they are hand made and not from a big box store. 

Shown in our black oil finish but also available in the dark rust brown as well.

Shipped out priority mail with delivery confirmation included.

These can be made in other sizes as well, please call or email our shop and ask for Scott for any questions or special requests at...802-483-2575

name: Hand Forged Ring Towel Holder
description:
Here is another new item we are offering to our customers. It is a ring towel holder in our very popular candle flame style and with a small fiddlehead curl added to the end of the ring. 

These have been made to compliment our other towel bars and paper holders in this style. Please see our other listings for these items.

These would be perfect in the bathroom or kitchen and for the bar area as well. Shown in our dark rust brown finish but also available in our black oil and gray forge finishes. Mounting screws are always included with our iron work.

They are made form 1/2" round stock, approximately 15" long and the ring is about 6". 

Made one at a time and hand hammered to shape on an antique anvil, right here in our Vermont blacksmith forge. Nothing adds to the character of your home like the look and feel of real hand forged wrought iron!

name: Hand Forged Wall Rack
description:
These are our spade end wall racks and can be used to hang coats and hats or for various other uses such as a hanger for kitchen pots and pans or cooking utensils.

They are approximately 21" long with four 2" hooks, but can be made in any length and number of hooks needed.

Made right here, one at a time in our Vermont blacksmith shop. 
Shown in our black oil finish but, also available in our rust brown and gray forge finishes as well.

These hangers will last for generations and add a distinctive look of vermont forged wrought iron to your home.

Please call our email our shop with any questions or special requests and ask for Scott at.......802-483-2575

name: Wrought Iron Paper Towel/Toilet Paper Holder
description:
Here is another new item to come out of our blacksmith shop. These have our very popular candle flame style ends and can be used in different locations in your home. They can be a paper towel holder mounted on the wall either vertically or horizontally or a double toilet paper holder attached in the same manner, if space is a concern. They also work well for just a regular small towel if you choose.

Approximately 19" long and made from 1/2" stock. These look great anywhere you put them and add a distinctive look of hand forged Vermont wrought iron to your home.

Made one at a time, heated in our coal forge and hand hammered to shape on an antique anvil. 

Shown in our dark rust brown finish but also available in our black oil and gray forge finishes. These can be made in other sizes and styles if needed. Mounting screws are always provided with our ironwork.

Please call or email our shop with any questions or special requests and ask for Scott at........802-483-2575

name: Wrought iron towel bar
description:
This is another candle flame style towel bar from our blacksmith shop here in Vermont. The original was made as a special order for one of our customers right here on Etsy. 

This one is aproximately 14" long and shown with our rust brown finish. It can however be made in a longer length for larger towels and is also available in our black oil finish.

Made from 1/2" square steel this bar can also be used as a paper towel holder as well as holding kitchen utensils or any number of things in the kitchen or bath. Wherever you put these they will add a distinctive look of real Vermont wrought iron to your home.

Please call our shop for any questions or special requests at ......802-483-2575 and ask for Scott.

name: Rams Head Wrought Iron Wall Rack
description:
This is another style wall rack with the curled rams head ends we are offering. It also has our new rust brown finish that is now available on all our pieces. It can be purchased with the black oil finish if prefered.
Like all of our pieces, they are handmade one at a time in our blacksmith shop right here in Vermont.
This piece is approximately 18" long with four hooks but can be made in any length and number of hooks.

Please give us a call at the shop if you have any questions or changes and ask for Scott.....802-483-2575 

These are made to order depending on size needed.

name: Wrought Iron Hand Forged Door Pull
description:
This is another one of our wrought iron door pulls in the bean end style. This one is shown in our very popular rust brown finish but also available in our standard black as pictured in our other listings. They are 12" long but are available in other sizes if needed. This size works well for most large inside doors as well as small outside shed doors. The iron we use for these pulls is 1" wide x 5/16" thick for a very substantial handle. Grab onto one of our pulls and you know it is handmade, no flimsy stampings here. There is nothing like hand forged iron hardware. Made to order one at a time in our blacksmith shop right here in the mountains of Vermont.

Price includes shipping. Screws provided.

Please see our other large barn door pull in our other listing if you need a larger size door pull.

This pull can be made with a thumb latch and catch if needed. Please call our shop at 802-483-2575 and ask for Scott for more information and options.

name: Norfolk Door Pull
description:
This is our rendition of a Norfolk style door pull. It is available in several sizes and finish options. Shown in our black oil finish, which can be used indoors or outside. These door pulls are one of many classic hardware designs we offer. Made one at a time in our blacksmith shop right here in the green mountains of Vermont.

This is our larger size at 10" long x 2" wide. These are made to order depending on size needed.

Please call or email our shop and ask for Scott at......802-483-2575

name: Wrought Iron Wall Hooks
description:
These are our extremely popular hand forged wall hooks, shown in the dark rust brown finish. They are very handy to have all around the home or garden or anywhere that needs a place to hang something from. About 2" deep and 3 3/4"" tall made right here as always, in Vermont.

****** Sold in lots of 6 with screws provided so you can put them to use right away.

Shipped out priority mail and up to 18 hooks can be shipped in one box with no increase in postage.

name: Hand forged wall hooks
description:
These are another style hook we offer here from our blacksmith shop in the mountains of Vermont.

They are made from 1/4" square stock and have a twist in the middle to add a little extra detail. Shown in the first picture in our rust brown finish and the second in the black oil. Please state which finish you prefer when ordering.

These look great and work perfect to hang just about anything you can fit on them, while adding a little Vermont wrought iron to your home.

Approximately 4" long with a 1 1/2" inside diameter. Other sizes available in this style please contact us for details.

Screws are provided with each hook and up to 18 can be shipped in one flat rate priority mail box with no increase in shipping cost.

We now offer quantity discounts for 50 hooks or more. Please call or email our shop and ask for Scott for more information and questions at 802-483-2575

name: Large Wrought Iron Wall Hook
description:
These are approximately 5" long x 2 1/2" deep and made from the same 5/16" round stock as the smaller version. These can be used to hold many items in your home and the customer that asked for these first, plans to hang several of her cutting boards on each hook in her kitchen.

Shown in our rust brown finish but also available in our black oil finish as well. As always we provide screws with our iron work so you can put them to use right away.

Made in our Vermont blacksmith shop one at a time making each one unique and one of a kind.

We now offer quantity discounts for 50 or more hooks ordered. Please email or call the number below for more details and pricing.

Shipped priority mail and up to 12 hooks can be mailed in one box with no increase in postage.

*****We have increased our production capacity of these as well as other hooks we offer here and have over 100 instock and waiting for the finish of your choice, either rust or black oil*****


Other sizes and variations available. Please call our shop with any questions or special requests and ask for Scott at.......802-483-2575

name: Fireplace Mantle Stocking Hanger
description:
This is our rendition of a wrought iron Christmas stocking hanger made right here in our Vermont blacksmith shop. They can be used on the fireplace mantle a shelf or even just the kitchen counter top. They work perfect and keep inplace by just the weight of the stocking or decorations you hang from it.

The one pictured will work on a mantle up to 4" thick but all our work here can be custom sized so if you have a larger fireplace mantle, we can make them bigger if needed. Larger sizes require additonal shipping, please email or call for this price.

Made from 1/4" square steel and shown in our rust brown finish and the second picture in the black oil but also available in the gray forge finish as well . Please mention which finish you prefer when ordering



Stocking not included.

Please call our shop and ask for Scott at 802-483-2575 for any questions or special requests.

name: Fireplace Mantle Stocking Hanger, Scrolled End
description:
These are another style Christmas stocking hanger we are offering from our shop. They are made to fit on all sizes of fireplace mantles but also work perfect on shelves or any flat surface. 

These adjust to whatever they are on, to hang your stockings at just the right angle and hold them perfectly...... just waiting for Christmas Eve!

Made one at a time right here in our Vermont blacksmith shop. Heated in a coal fired forge and hand hammered to shape on an antique anvil. These add a distinctive touch of real hand forged wrought iron to your home.

Approximately 8 inches long and made strong from 3/8" stock to hold everything that Santa could put in your stocking!

Shown in our black oil finish but also available in our rust brown and gray forge finishes.

Stocking not included.

Please call or email or shop if you would like to order more than what is available in the listing or for any questions at..........802-483-2575......and ask for Scott
